ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dsmmlss.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 2 |  | dsmmlss.s | |- ( ph -> S e. Ring ) |
| 3 |  | dsmmlss.r | |- ( ph -> R : I --> LMod ) |
| 4 |  | dsmmlss.k | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( Scalar ` ( R ` x ) ) = S ) |
| 5 |  | dsmmlmod.c | |- C = ( S (+)m R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S Xs_ R ) = ( S Xs_ R ) |
| 7 | 6, 2, 1, 3, 4 | #P_prdslmodd | |- ( ph -> ( S Xs_ R ) e. LMod ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` ( S Xs_ R ) ) = ( LSubSp ` ( S Xs_ R ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( S (+)m R ) ) = ( Base ` ( S (+)m R ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 9 | #P_dsmmlss | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( S (+)m R ) ) e. ( LSubSp ` ( S Xs_ R ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9 | #P_dsmmval2 | |- ( S (+)m R ) = ( ( S Xs_ R ) |`s ( Base ` ( S (+)m R ) ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_eqtri | |- C = ( ( S Xs_ R ) |`s ( Base ` ( S (+)m R ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12, 8 | #P_lsslmod | |- ( ( ( S Xs_ R ) e. LMod /\ ( Base ` ( S (+)m R ) ) e. ( LSubSp ` ( S Xs_ R ) ) ) -> C e. LMod ) |
| 14 | 7, 10, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> C e. LMod ) |
